trustfund:
TF035591-ECA REGION - MUNICIPAL FINANCE,TF034504-GEORGIA - ENTERPRISE REHABILITATION,TF034338-GEORGIA - PRIVATE SECTOR DEVELOPMENT,TF034337-GEORGIA - PRIVATE SECTOR DEVELOPMENT,TF033403-ECA REGION  (MOLDOVA, LATVIA)
            FINANCIAL AND ENTERPRISE SECTOR

abstracts.cdata!:
The Enterprise Rehabilitation Project
            will improve the efficiency of private and privatized firms
            and develop managerial capacity. Furthermore, the project
            will strengthen institutional capacity, thus facilitating
            reform. In addition, it will support the creation of
            associations of enterprise consultants and managers, as well
            as small private businesses. The project consists of two
            main components: 1) the enterprise rehabilitation will be
            supported through non-investment restructuring of new and
            privatized enterprises. Initially, foreign consultants with
            a knowledge proven record from transition economies, will
            lead the way, providing extensive on-the-job training to
            local consultants; 2) the enhancement of managerial and
            consulting skills, will be achieved through the organization
            and co-financing of secondment, in leading foreign
            enterprises. Critical risks are cited, such as a discrepancy
            between regulatory framework and actual practice, as well as
            a lack of implementation in the reform agenda.
